name: Marble Lines (itch)
description:
Try to remove lines of marbles before the board is full! Every move 3 new marbles will appear. Make lines of 5 or more marbles to remove them. Lines can be horizontal, vertical or diagonal. 

Controls:

Left Mouse Button: Click on a marble to move and click on a new position
BackSpace or Ctrl+Z: Undo last move
F7: Sound on/off
F8: Music on/off

The music is from Sinfoniëtta by Joachim Raff.

This game was written in Haxe with OpenFL, originally for flash, but converted to html5.
